transcript:
Customer: khatam kar do
(silence)
Hello.
Executive: Very good evening.
Customer: Good evening.
Executive: Sir, main Roshan baat kar raha hun Siddharth ka manager Indiamart office se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji sir, kaise hain aap bataye kya dikkat aa rahi hai?
Customer: Aap check kar rahe ho check kar paoge mera account kaisa lead by lead aa raha hai kaisa hum consume kar rahe hain kitna lead dete hain aap log?
Executive: Haan bilkul sir main bata sakta hun aapko main sari cheez detail check kar sakta hun.
Customer: Haan boliye to.
Executive: Ek second sir hold kijiyega.
Customer: Humne kis cheez ke liye humne wo kiya tha do main product hai discharge supply kiya hai aur do main product hai mera kiya hai discharge rod.
Hmm.
Customer: Rescue.
Customer: To this main to discharge rod hi hai.
Executive: Aapne aapne do product kiya hua hai discharge rod aur rescue hook ka.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Right aapko total 72 by lead per week milti hai aur aapko iske hisab se in do categories ka top 10 city mein as a star supplier ki visibility milti hai right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hai na ab main aapko by lead consumption batau to ek hafte mein aap 15 20 22 by lead is accordingly aap consume kar rahe ho.
Hai na?
Customer: Haan ek hafte mein 20 liya hai.
Executive: Haan kitna dete hain aap log?
Executive: Hum 73 72 de rahe hain sir.
Customer: 72 de rahe hain.
Executive: Right aur aur dekhiye to quantity kya kya hai usme?
Executive: Quantity sir exactly hum check nahi kar sakte hain ki quantity kya hai quantity quantity do ek piece aisa aa raha hai aap log pehle bola tha lena padega aapko lene se aayega to maine isliye le rahe hain lekin discharge rod ke upar discharge rod ke upar jyada dekhiye aap inquiry nahi aa raha hai theek se to maine pehle jo tahsil ha tahsil mein jo tha na abhi main nahi hun main on road gadi chala raha hai main office mein tha tab main bahut bar try kar rahe the helpline pe to baat hoke fir kya ho jata hai chup ho ja raha hai baat nahi ho raha hai aawaz nahi aa raha hai isliye wo kat gaya do bar aisa karke.
Hmm.
Customer: Clear baat nahi hua.
Executive: To ek bari na sir aap batao hum online hume online baith ke discuss karna padega to kab hum kab aap available hai ya kab hum aapko call kar le?
Customer: Ha main ek ghante ke baad hum office mein fir baithenge theek hai na aur kal subah to subah to baat ho sakta hai koi issue nahi hai kal subah baat kar lenge hum.
Executive: Kal subah kal subah ka meeting schedule kar lete hain.
Customer: Right aur kal subah ka main aapko video meeting ki link bhi bhej deta hun.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Kal subah kitne baje ka bhej du sir aap bataye?
Customer: Jo bhi hoga 10 baje ke baad hi hoga.
Executive: To main 10:30 ka bhej du aapko?
Customer: 10:30 11 baje tak bhej dijiye aap.
Executive: Main 11 baje ka meeting bhej deta hun ek bar to kal connect kar lete hain kya aa rahi hai kya dikkat nahi aa rahi hai kaun sa keyword hum update kar sakte hain aapka competition kaisa isme follow kar raha hai right?
Customer: Ji ji aur bhi bahut baat hai jo jo regular mein jo aa rahe the jaisa inquiry aa rahe the waise hi aa rahe hain thoda kam hi aa raha hai direct roz ka call.
Executive: Sir usse badhiya aayegi sir don't worry usse badhiya aayegi.
Customer: Ha teen call aane aana chahiye tha regular teen call to aayega hi must lekin kabhi kabhi aata hai kabhi kabhi nahi aa raha hai aisa ho bhi ho raha hai.
Executive: Dekhiye sir kya hota hai na dekhiye online promotion hai right abhi aapki company naye naye char jagah pe panch jagah pe dikhni shuru hui hai hai na 10 jagah pe aapki company dikhni shuru hui hai to online jab mere ko jab main milta hai main turant dekhiye ek inquiry ka message aata hai main har time dhoondhta hun tab to milta hi nahi hai ek minute offline ho jata hai mat raha kare main aap jaisa bola tha discharge ha discharge search karke aapne bola hai ki dekh lijiye wo karke har time hum check karke dekhte hain lekin nahi aa raha hai nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Koi baat nahi aap log jaisa bol rahe hain na discharge rescue aap upar se wo search karke aap lead nahi aayega to aap search karke dekhiye tab aa sakta hai na hum aisa bhi bahut try kiya hai.
Executive: Main wahi keh raha hun ki aap ek bari ko online aaye ek bar ko online baith ke discuss karte hain and we will try ki hum apne taraf se best aapke liye kya kar sakte hain kya nahi kar sakte we will try our best hai na aap uske liye befikar rahe hain jo bhi better ho payega sir wo better karenge.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai wahi baat hai main abhi to aaram se hum to kar nahi payenge kyunki main rasta mein hun on road driving kar raha hun to main kal meeting maine aapko bhej diya hai.
Customer: Ha ha theek hai theek hai wahi wahi better hoga.
Executive: Ha kal subah ka maine 11 baje ka bhej diya aapko.
Customer: Don't worry sir.
Executive: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about lead consumption.

- Inquiries are not coming properly.

- Facing issues with helpline connectivity.

- Number of calls are less than expected.



Resolution:

- Executive checked lead consumption details.

- Scheduled a video meeting for the next day.

- Shared a video meeting link for discussion.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting scheduled for the next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, meeting, inquiry
